name: Out of the Woods (Croxel Studios)
description:
Made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48

In this game, you must save the mystical light birds from the evil of the forest.

As you go deeper into the darkness of the woods, you will move slower and get consumed by it, you can only survive by saving light birds and bringing them to their wooden bird houses.

Credits:

  • Pablo Moreno (@HypercubeCore):  Level design & VFX
  • Natalia Espigares: Graphics
  • Luis Gutiérrez (@Lwyx): Programming
  • Alberto Navarro (@forameuss): Music & SFX

Social media: Twitter – Instagram – Facebook – Website
